title: Horror as 'child raped in pub' as police hunt 45-65-year-old man
description: Police want to speak to a middle-aged man in connection with the rape of a child at a countryside pub.
content:
Police have released an e-fit image of a man they want to speak to in connection with the alleged rape of a child at a pub in the English countryside. The child, of an unspecified age, was allegedly attacked at The Bridge Inn in High Green, Breewood, an ancient market town in rural Staffordshire, in 2018. The incident was belatedly reported to Staffordshire Police this year, prompting authorities to release a computer-generated image of an individual they want to speak to in relation to the assault. The force also issued a description of the man, who is said to be between 45 and 65-years-old, around 5ft 6ins tall, and of medium build with dark, greying hair and blue eyes. The West Midlands-based law enforcement has not released further information about the assault.

A spokesperson for Staffordshire Police appealed for anyone with information about the incident, or the man depicted in the e-fit, to contact the force immediately. "We have issued an image of a man we want to identify following the rape of a child in Brewood," they said. "This incident took place in 2018 at The Bridge Inn in High Green, Brewood.

"It was reported to us earlier this year. The man is described as aged between 45 and 65, 5ft 6ins tall, of medium build with dark but greying hair, and blue eyes. "If you recognise this man, or have any information that could help our investigation, please contact us." Anyone with information that could help the investigation can contact Staffordshire Police by calling 101 and quoting incident number 310 of 10 March, or via the live chat on the force's website. Reports can also be made anonymously by calling Crimestoppers on 0800 555 111.
summary: Police are seeking a 45-65-year-old man in relation to the alleged rape of a child at a pub in rural Staffordshire in 2018. The incident was only discovered after it was reported to the police this year. Police have released an e-fit image of the man, who is said to be between 45 and 65 years old, around 5ft 6ins tall, and of medium build with dark hair and blue eyes. They have not released any further information about the assault.
shortSummary: Police have released an e-fit image of a 45-year-old man they want to speak to in connection with the alleged rape of a child in a pub in 2018.

argos_summary: Police in Staffordshire have released an e-fit image of a man they wish to speak to regarding an alleged child rape that occurred in 2018 at The Bridge Inn in High Green, Brewood. The incident was reported to authorities this year, prompting the appeal for information about the suspect, described as a man aged between 45 and 65, approximately 5ft 6ins tall, with medium build, dark greying hair, and blue eyes. Staffordshire Police are urging anyone with relevant information to come forward.
